Title: Establishes a registry in New York city for residents who do not want circulars or other printed material or samples of a commercial nature left at their residence
Summary: Establishes a registry in New York city for residents who do not want circulars or other printed material or samples of a commercial nature left at their residence.
LawCode: Add ยง10-121.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the regulation of unsolicited circulars
